SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.codexnaturalis
Package it.polimi.ingsw.codexnaturalis.model.game.components.structure

Class Structure

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.codexnaturalis.model.game.components.structure.Structure
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Structure extends Object implements Serializable
Represents the structure where cards are placed in the game. Provides methods for managing and interacting with the structure, including placing cards, calculating points, and checking placements.
See Also:

    • getPointsFromPlayableCard

      public int getPointsFromPlayableCard(Card placed, Boolean frontUp) throws IllegalCommandException
      This method is used to calculate the points that a card placed on the structure will give. It checks if the card is front up or down and if it is a gold or resource card. If the card is front up, it will check the points type and return the points accordingly.
      Parameters:
      placed - the card to be placed
      frontUp - the side of the card that will be visible (front side up -> true, front side down -> false)
      Returns:
      the points that the card will give
      Throws:
      IllegalCommandException - if the card is not a gold or resource card

    • isPlaceable

      public Boolean isPlaceable(Card father, Card card, Integer coordinate, Boolean frontUp) throws IllegalCommandException
      This method acts differently according to the type of card the user want to place.
      If the card is an initial one isPlaceable return true only in there's not another initial card placed on the structure.
      Else it sequentially performs these actions: Checks if the father card is present
      If father card is not placed, the new card cannot be placed
      If father card is not placed, the new card cannot be placed
      Checks if the card is already placed
      Checks if another card is already placed in that coordinate
      Checks if the placed card does not cover one of the uncoverable corners of neighbour cards
      If the placed card is a Gold one checks if the player's structure satisfies card's requirement
      Parameters:
      father - the card under the placed one
      card - the card user want to place
      coordinate - the coordinate on the matrix where the card is placed computed in the placeCard method according to the position string passed
      frontUp - the side choose for the placement
      Returns:
      true is the card is placeable, exception otherwise. The method never returns false.
      Throws:
      IllegalCommandException - thrown when a card is not placeable. A proper description message is linked to the exception.

    • placeCard

      public void placeCard(Card father, Card card, String position, Boolean frontUp) throws IllegalCommandException
      This method is used to place a card on the structure. It checks if the card can be placed and then places it.
      Parameters:
      father - the card on which the new card will be placed
      card - the card to be placed
      position - the position of the new card relative to the father card (TL, TR, BL, BR)
      frontUp - the side of the card that will be visible (front side up -> true, front side down -> false)
      Throws:
      IllegalCommandException - if the card cannot be placed

    • getRadius

      public int getRadius(Map<Integer,Triplet<Card,Boolean,Boolean>> coordinateToCard) throws IllegalCommandException
      This method's aim is to provide a simplified search space for SearchXPattern's methods.
      Parameters:
      coordinateToCard - to extract the coordinate of the placed card
      Returns:
      max distance from the centre of the matrux
      Throws:
      IllegalCommandException - ex

    • printReducedMatrix

      public void printReducedMatrix(Card[][] fullMatrix, Integer radius)
      This method is used to test purposes after filling the structure with some values. It will print a [2*radius][2*radius] matrix
      Parameters:
      fullMatrix - the full [80][80] matrix
      radius - radius computed in getRadius
